author: Andrii Osypchuk
description: A floral riff on a classic Daiquiri with a hint of berry fruitiness and a lavender pink hue courtesy of a blueberry threesome.
name: Floral Daiquiri
recipeIngredient: 60 ml White (charcoal-filtered) 1-4 year old light rum

recipeInstructions.text: Rinse chilled glass with violet liqueur and set aside ready for drink
MUDDLE blueberries in base of shaker
Add other ingredients, SHAKE with ice and fine strain into rinsed glass
